mapper.select: select b.b_code, b.b_content, b.b_regdate, m.m_code, m.m_id, m.m_picture, count(g_code) g_cnt, count(c.cm_code) cm_cnt, count(img_code) img_cnt from board b join img i on b.b_code = i.b_code left join good g on b.b_code = g.b_code left join comm c on c.b_code = b.b_code left join member m on b.m_code = m.m_code join follow f on m.m_code = f.m_code where f.m_code2 = ${value} group by b.b_code,b.b_content,m.m_code,b.b_regdate,m.m_id,m.m_picture order by b.b_code desc
select c.cm_content, m.m_id cm_id, c.cm_code, c.pm_id from comm c join member m on c.m_code = m.m_code where c.b_code = ${value} and ROWNUM<3 order by c.cm_code DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board values((select nvl(max(b_code),0)+1 from board),#{b_content},sysdate,1)
insert into img values((select nvl(max(img_code),0)+1 from img),#{img_img},(select nvl(max(b_code),0) from board))
mapper.update: update board set b_content= #{b_content}, b_regdate= #{b_regdate} where b_code = #{b_code}
update img set img_img= #{img_img} where img_code = #{img_code}
